results.title: Metformin suppressed tendon injury-induced adhesion via hydrogel-nanoparticle sustained-release system.
results.text_hl: Some studies had shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could reduce @<m>DISEASE_Tendinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052256 @@@tendon adhesion@@@ as well.
